aboutpara: My name is Dannedra Clevero Ananda known as Clevero, I started my journey as Robot Software Engineer (Programmer) since the begining of 2021 at the age of 18. I have done some robotics project, especially on autonomous system. I also have some achivements on national and also international competition.

experiences.position: Robot Software RnD at IRIS ITS
bullets: Revamp all the algorithm and low-level code from scratch, and get a better, and faster processing
Worked on Keeper algorithm using C++ and ROS with Numeric Methods such as extrapolations, etc
Processing sensors such as odometry, realsense 3D Camera, LiDAR, Omni Vision, etc

experiences.position: ROBOT SOFTWARE RND (INTERNSHIP) at PUI-AiHESS ITS
bullets: Worked on Simulation platform for autonomous soccer robot
Using Gazebo and ROS for simulation to develop a real environment for soccer robot
Worked on the UI of a Service Robot using React Typescript
Communicating with ROS, and also real time weather data
Help to develop basestation as main control of the robot, where users can replace contents, etc
Revamp the code of old loadscanner to have a robust system with minimum amount of error
Handled on site troubles remotely (We have more than 15 Units on site)
Developing algorithm for volume calculation, merging two pointclouds, etc
Worked on a Robot Service simulation and algorithm
Using JPDAF for robot obstacle classification
Using my thesis for robot's obstacle avoidance

education.universityPara: I am pursuing my degree in Electrical Engineering. I have done some robotics project, and some achivements on national and also international competition.
